institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) operating rules/Article 5-2 (exclusion and avoidance of deliberation committee members)
contents: Article 5-2 (Exclusion/Avoidance of Deliberation Committee Members) ① A member of the Deliberation Committee shall be excluded from performing his/her duties in any of the following cases. Revised December 31, 2019, 1. If the deliberation member is a member of the ISC Steering Committee, 2. If the deliberation member is an executive, employee or instructor of an industry-specific cooperative, group or joint training institution that conducts industry-led youth customized training, ② Deliberation If any of the reasons in paragraph (1) apply, committee members may voluntarily withdraw from deliberation and resolution with the approval of the chairperson. Newly established 2019. 12. 31.
